title: The Kassa Gambit
description: 2012 TOR hardcover, M. C. Planck (Sword of the Bright Lady). Centuries after the ecological collapse of Earth, humanity has spread among the stars. Under the governance of the League, our endless need for resources has driven us to colonize hundreds of planets, all of them devoid of other sentient life. Humanity is apparently alone in the universe.- Amazon
author: M.C. Planck
